meta.description: Determine the number of bikes and cars needed to transport at least 500 people, minimizing the number of bikes, with a constraint on the maximum percentage of cars.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of vehicles available for transportation

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of vehicle

params.name: max_car_ratio
params.description: Maximum allowed ratio of cars to total vehicles

params.name: min_people
params.description: Minimum number of people to transport

vars.name: num_vehicles
vars.description: Number of each type of vehicle used

objective.name: min_total_bikes
objective.description: Minimize the total number of bikes used

constraints.name: people_transport_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 500 people are transported

constraints.name: car_ratio_limit
constraints.description: At most 40% of the vehicles can be cars
